claim: Journey's fourth album was Infinity, released in 1978.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Infinity is Journey 's fourth album , released in January 1978 on Columbia Records .

claim: Journey's fourth album was Infinity, released in 1978.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Originally a progressive rock band , Journey was described by AllMusic as having cemented a reputation as `` one of America 's most beloved  (  and sometimes hated  )  commercial rock/pop bands '' by 1978 , when they redefined their sound by embracing pop arrangements on their fourth album , Infinity .
